body_html: It seems to me that, order of operations wise, we should land #12950 first, and that will eliminate most of the codemodding in this diff. Otherwise, we have to whiplash it to c10::optional, and then whiplash it back shortly afterwards. That makes people working on diffs that touch these lines grumpy, because it makes extra merge conflicts. Let's not make people grumpy.

body: It seems to me that, order of operations wise, we should land #12950 first, and that will eliminate most of the codemodding in this diff. Otherwise, we have to whiplash it to `c10::optional`, and then whiplash it back shortly afterwards. That makes people working on diffs that touch these lines grumpy, because it makes extra merge conflicts. Let's not make people grumpy.
